posts.title: Jane Eyre
posts.main_text: The novel revolutionised prose fiction by being the first to focus on its protagonist's moral and spiritual development through an intimate first-person narrative, where actions and events are coloured by a psychological intensity.
posts.author: Charlotte Brontë

posts.title: Špagete karbonara
posts.main_text: Špagete karbonara niko ne odbija: Ali ovo je JEDINI TAČAN RECEPT za pripremu 23.06.2018. 20:38  0 Špagete karbonara je italijansko jelo od testenine i smatra se gotovo nezaobilaznim u rimskoj kuhinji. Priprema se na jednostavan način, veoma je hranljivo i prilično jakog ukusa.
posts.author: John
